frontmatter.title: A year of programming related Reddit posts I liked
frontmatter.description: I like to share interesting programming articles with my co-workers. Most of these come from Reddit. Someone asked if I had a comprehensive list... so here ya go.

frontmatter.title: Seeking continuous integration with GitLab, Helm, and monorepos
frontmatter.description: There comes a time when every team must dive deep into the automation ocean. For us it was somewhere around the 30 engineer mark. Hereâ€™s how we matured our continuous integration approach while scaling to 100+ engineers working on 40+ microservices using GitLab CI, Docker, Kubernetes, and Helm.
